item.title: Fillup
item.description: A game I made in July to January 2023-24, now in its testing phase. The manual and documentation: https://shorturl.at/kuX29 The game layout: The empty playing board All basic items tokens ready to put in the game: All basic ability tokens ready to put in the game: There are 8 different abilities, each has 4 The healthboard: The player decides behind the wall what they want to do. After the deciding time is up, the wall is removed and the actions take place.

item.title: Grabo
item.description: In July/August 2023, I worked on a My First Game Jam project called Grabo. Inspired by Kingdom Hearts III using Unreal Engine 4, I wanted to make an Unreal Engine 5 Game as a general 2D platformer. Grabo, a beartrap in a 2D platformer who needs to destroy all melty liquid vats. This is written in Unreal Engine 5.2.1 as a 2023 My First Game Jam entry ( https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2023 ).
